title: Burt's Bees Sensitive Night Cream, 1.8 Ounces
description: Wake up to skin that’s more moisturized with Burt’s Bees® Sensitive Night Cream. This rejuvenating cream jar helps hydrate sensitive skin overnight without causing redness or irritation. It’s formulated with softening cotton extract to help skin replenish its outer layer, to minimize the effects of potential irritants such as harsh soaps or cleansers. This cream also contains rice extract and aloe. Fragrance-free, hypoallergenic, allergy-tested and dermatologist tested, this 99% natural facial moisturizer was specially formulated for sensitive skin. Use it every night as part of the Burt’s Bees® Sensitive skin care regimen. Put the power of nature to work for your skin with Burt’s Bees.

title: Blue Lizard Australian SUNSCREEN SPF 30+, Baby, SPF 30+, 8.75-Ounces
description: Blue Lizard Australian Suncream Baby SPF 30+ is a broad spectrum sun block that is extremely water resistant. Blue Lizard utilizes transparent Zinc Oxide along with Titanium Dioxie to provide broad spectrum protection from both UVA and UVB rays.  Blue Lizard Baby is Chemical and Fragrance FREE. The packaging is unique as it provides a UV indicator for consumers to know when they need to be wearing suncreen.  The bottle turns PINK when exposed to UV rays.

title: Mistral Shea Butter Soap, Gardenia, 7-Ounce Bar
description: Hand-crafted in the heart of Provence, France, Mistral soaps are made according to a three-hundred year old tradition of purity and excellence. Following a time honored know-how, or "savoir-faire," we produce the finest triple milled soaps in the world by carefully selecting the highest quality oils of olive, palm or coconut and combining them with skin-softening African shea butter, renowned for its protective, rejuvenating properties. Our quality craftsmanship produces pure vegetable soaps praised for their rich lather, silky texture, and exquisite fragrance.

title: BabyGanics Fine and Handy Foaming Hand Soap, Tangerine, 8.45-Ounce (Pack of 2), Packaging May Vary
description: Hand washing not high on your ‘family fun activities' list?  Get the gang together for a foamy giggle-fest! This non-toxic formula cleans, moisturizes and promises endless seconds of safe hilarity. (Maybe we don't get out enough?)

title: Seventh Generation Baby Sunscreen SPF 30, 3 Ounce
description: Even indirect sun can affect baby's fragile skin. Smooth on this gentle, hypo-allergenic lotion for baby-safe, broad-spectrum (UVA and UVB) protection that's good for the whole family. The water-resistant SPF 30 formula features non-absorbing mineral sun filters that stay on the skin's surface to defend against harmful rays. Contains no chemical sunscreens, parabens, gluten or PABA.
